snippet: State Representative H. William DeWeese, a Democrat, was found guilty of crimes stemming from his use of state employees to campaign for him free.
abstract: State Representative H William DeWeese, an 18-term Democrat of Pennsylvania, is found guilty of theft and criminal conspiracy stemming from his use of state employees to campaign for him free; faces up to 38 years in prison.
lead_paragraph: State Representative H. William DeWeese, a Democrat, was found guilty of crimes stemming from his use of state employees to campaign for him free.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Lawmaker Guilty in Campaign Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Lawmaker Guilty In Campaign Inquiry
